channel.title: [317 DELTA] Items 2H
channel.description:
Hey guys,
I got this server that I use as a base and the guy who made the server coded in spirit shields but when I wield them, they appear as 2handed shields, meaning I can't equip a weapon or the shield will be unwielded. How do I solve this? Thanks :)
